references.reason: This is a foundational paper in the field of conformal prediction, providing a comprehensive overview of the theory and applications.
This paper extends conformal prediction to handle distributional forecasts, addressing a key limitation of previous methods.

references.paper_title: Fast exact conformalization of the lasso using piecewise linear homotopy
references.reason: This paper presents a significant advance in computational efficiency for conformal prediction, specifically addressing the challenges associated with high-dimensional data.
This paper develops distribution-free prediction sets, a critical advancement for robust and reliable predictions.
This paper provides a modern overview of conformal prediction, synthesizing key concepts and advancements for a broader audience.
